genSynthFlow

Class CandOAsPerWZ

  • java.lang.Object
    • genSynthFlow.CandOAsPerWZ

  • public class CandOAsPerWZ
extends java.lang.Object
    Candidate OAs that are within specified distance interval of a single specified WZ. (Candidates are determined by OA-WZ distances only; if their flow count is zero this is not taken into consideration as census record swapping may have occurred reducing an OA commute count to 0)
    Version:
    1.1, August 2014
    Author:
    Richard Thomas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> candOAsList
      Candidate OAs origins for a single WZ destination (determined by measuring OA-WZ Population Weighted Centroid distances)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CandOAsPerWZ(ZoneFlowList oaFlowList, ZoneFlowList wzFlowList, int indexWZ, int minDistance, int maxDistance)
      Calculate candidate OAs that are within specified distance interval of selected WZ, but rejecting all OAs with zero flow counts.

    • Field Detail

      • candOAsList

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> candOAsList
        Candidate OAs origins for a single WZ destination (determined by measuring OA-WZ Population Weighted Centroid distances)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CandOAsPerWZ

        public CandOAsPerWZ(ZoneFlowList oaFlowList,
            ZoneFlowList wzFlowList,
            int indexWZ,
            int minDistance,
            int maxDistance)
        Calculate candidate OAs that are within specified distance interval of selected WZ, but rejecting all OAs with zero flow counts. (Although census record swapping might reduce an OA commute count to 0, it is considered better to still exclude such OAs from possible routing as preventing such routing will on the whole make the analysis clearer and more representative)
        Parameters:
        wzFlowList - List of total flows to each Workplace Zone (WZ)
        oaFlowList - List of total flows from each Output Area (OA)
        indexWZ - Destination Workplace Zone
        minDistance - Minimum distance OA and WZ PWCs must be apart
        maxDistance - Minimum distance OA and WZ PWCs must be apart

    • Method Detail

      • getNewlyShuffledCandOAsPerWZ

        public int[] getNewlyShuffledCandOAsPerWZ(java.util.Random randGen)
        Return newly shuffled list of candidate OAs for selected WZ. Allows possibility for each worker in a WZ to have a differently ordered list of the same OAs.. at the cost of MUCH more storage space; Bristol UA has 484 WZs, but 61281 commuters to those (a factor of 127x).
        Parameters:
        randGen - Pseudo-random number generator
        Returns:
        Candidate OA index list (in random order)

      • getCandOAsPerWZ

        public int[] getCandOAsPerWZ()
        Return current list of candidate OAs for selected WZ.
        Returns:
        Candidate OA index list (in order)

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Get number of OAs within range of WZ this list was created for
        Returns:
        total count of OAs
